src:
Tentang Sentuhan Frank Lampard di Balik Performa Impresif Mason Mount
05 Nov 2019, 10:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mason Mount bersyukur memiliki pelatih seperti Frank Lampard. Di Chelsea, dia bisa mempelajari banyak hal dan mendapatkan kesempatan bermain hanya karena kepercayaan Lampard.
Lampard memang terus membuat kejutan sejak menangani The Blues. Sempat diduga bakal kesulitan karena embargo transfer dan pasca kepergian Eden Hazard, Lampard justru membentuk tim Chelsea yang lebih kuat dan lebih komplet.
Chelsea yang sekarang menyuguhkan permainan menarik dengan pemain-pemain muda yang bisa diandalkan. Selain Mount, masih ada Tammy Abraham, Fikayo Tomori, Callum Hudson-Odoi, dan beberapa nama lainnya.
Mount terbilang salah satu yang paling gemilang, untuk itu dia hanya bisa memuji Lampard. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
About Frank Lampard's Touch Behind Mason Mount's Impressive Performance
05 November 2019, 10:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mason Mount is grateful to have a coach like Frank Lampard. At Chelsea, he can learn many things and get the chance to play just because of Lampard's trust.
Lampard did continue to make surprises since handling the Blues. Had been expected to be difficult because of the transfer embargo and after the departure of Eden Hazard, Lampard actually formed a Chelsea team that was stronger and more complete.
Chelsea are now presenting an interesting game with young players who can be relied upon. Besides Mount, there are still Tammy Abraham, Fikayo Tomori, Callum Hudson-Odoi, and several other names.
Mount is considered one of the most brilliant, for that he can only praise Lampard. Read below, Bolaneters!
